channel.title: Troubleshooting on Josh Clark
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on Josh Clark

item.title: Troubleshoot Like a Doctor: Differential Diagnosis
item.description: Introduction The IT field is terrible at teaching people how to troubleshoot. Sure, if you got a CompTIA A+ or a CCNA, there were modules that talked about how to solve problems, but how much time did you actually spend on those modules? The CCNA course I took spent all of 5 minutes on it, with the message “there’s probably going to be a question that will ask what order these steps come in.
